LanguageData.PawnHasNoAbilities: This pawn has acquired no abilities.
LanguageData.PawnHasNoActiveAbilities: Mark an ability above, by clicking the '+' button, to enable its control gizmo.
LanguageData.EnchantableInstructionsTrans: Enchantable objects such as weapons, clothing and armor, and jewellery, can be designated for enchanting and hauled by a pawn capable of hauling.
LanguageData.SoulGemsInstructionsTrans: Soul gems are required to perform enchantments. They can be designated for enchanting and hauled by a pawn capable of hauling.
